summary: "Spectre" is a 2015 spy movie, the 24th in the James Bond series. Directed by Sam Mendes, it stars Daniel Craig as Bond, who fights against the global crime organization Spectre, led by Franz Oberhauser (Christoph Waltz). The film was made after legal issues were resolved, allowing the use of Spectre characters for the first time since 1971. Shooting took place in several countries and cost around $245â€“300 million. Critics had mixed feelings about the movie, liking the action and performances but not the story's pace. It made $880 million worldwide and won an Academy Award for its theme song.
title: Spectre (2015 film)
